info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 1 at 3:49PM MDT until April 1 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Sandoval County in north central New Mexico... West Central Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico...
* Until 545 PM MDT.
* At 349 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located near La Bajada, or 19 miles southwest of Santa Fe, and was stationary.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility to brownout conditions from damaging winds in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Santo Domingo Pueblo, Kewa Pueblo, La Bajada, Madrid, San Felipe Pueblo, Cerrillos Hills State Park, Los Cerrillos, Golden, La Cienega and Zia Pueblo.
This includes the following highways... Highway 550 near Mile Marker 16. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 248 and 273.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 5:45 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 5:45 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:45 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 5:45 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
